comments.body: *** Bug 13093 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

description:
Javadocs for PageContext.handlePageException(Exception) and 
PageContext.handlePageException(Throwable) clearly state that
a NullPointerException is to be thrown if a null reference is passed
to these methods.
summary: Compliance Issue - NPE not thrown if a null reference is passed to PageContext.handlePageException(Exception) or PageContext.handlePageException(Throwable).
